title: Allow F12 tools to be extended with Browser Extensions
body: I have currently built a browser extension for Chrome that allows me to add a new pane to the DevTools that has its own UI and can communicate with the current tab with a background page for the extensions.

comments.body:
This is a game changer for the developer experience! Just look at the amazing dev extensions for Chrome like React, Redux, Apollo, Vuejs & etc. Extensions like this make Chrome the best browser for developing for the Browser.
Make sure you provide great APIs and features for extending the dev panels and developers will build it!
